data.eml:eml: Afroleius floridus (Mahunka, 1985) comb. nov. and three new Afroleius Mahunka, 1984 species (Acari: Oribatida: Mycobatidae) from South Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Coetzee, Louise (2014): Afroleius floridus (Mahunka, 1985) comb. nov. and three new Afroleius Mahunka, 1984 species (Acari: Oribatida: Mycobatidae) from South Africa. Zootaxa 3889 (4): 553-573, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3889.4.4
